attributes.action: That an all party committee be set up to investigate the poor working practices of the DWP concerning Sanctions and the use thereof
attributes.additional_details:
A comprehensive independent review of the DWP and there actions concerning there working practices
ie :- with sanctions .
       having no help with interview costs when on hardship allowance .
     There being whole floors of pcs  not in use when there are many claimants that should be feeling the benefit of them  .
Also why Do clients have to ask about professional help on any subjects .When by  any kind of common sense . They should be fully informed  the help available to them ,as this will obviously help them return to employment .

rejection.details: Committiees are a matter for Parliament, not the Government
